title: Past Lives and Karma in the Thrust of Destiny- Paul Robert Ceret
description:
Past Lives and Karma in the Thrust of Destiny
In this non-fiction follow up to The Self Illuminating Path (available for free download in the About section) Ceretto further examines his life after his near death experience. Ceretto discusses how living with a traumatic brain injury has changed relationships with family and departed friends. Spiritual and humorous, Past Lives and Karma in the Thrust of Destiny, will keep you laughing and thinking as you yearn for volume two.
